message.body: Did Jeri Thys visit u today? Remember she's coming to your opening, and am I.
No. Was she going to call?
Grandpa did you see my email! I have class that night!

Yes, she was going to call. As far as the opening, since you r co- curator and exhibiting a piece, u should be able to get a dispensation from Ur prof. You may want to add that I invited several MIT people who r potential donors and I am flying to Boston for that special occasion. Add that if u don't show up at the opening it GP is cutting u off his will!
Relax, and a glass of brandy!
Haha
Ok!
I'm sure it will be fine I'm just stressing out a bit
U're the best by government test!
Haha. I know. Now that you are coming I'm afraid you won't like it. I think this show had a lot of holes. I have also spent so much time organizing it my piece isn't very good!!!
I love my GDs It GP
You opinion matters a lot to me.
I can't wait for next year. Maybe you can come for my thesis defense
Mwah
Yea, and I'll bring my Uzi machine gun!
We have an Argentinian pope, but he's neither Jewish, nor black, nor gay!
He keeps the iPhone he had when he was just a cardinal, which is naturally red!
None of the above!
Get the latest Pope dope
Caroline Hodara (Alain's daughter) just became an MD.)
Call me when you wake up!
Looks like Ariel and mark want dinner too. I'm thinking best to actually not include curators and roommates. You, me, Ingrid, Ariel, mark, and your friends? Legal seafood in Copley?
Yea, make it legal, that is Legal Seafood. PS: Do u think the owners who by the way are Jewish called it Legal because it's Kosher?
